item.title: Mouse
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 5.5" / 14 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. mouse pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in gray, peach and beige (leftover) Fingering weight yarn in silver (leftover) Size B-1 / 2 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (6 mm) Pins Stitch markers Scissors Fiberfill for stuffing body (in gray yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]
